_header: As it befell of a rich king
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Bodleian Library Arch. Selden B. 26 (SC 3340): f. 203v.
_description: The Melancholy King, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
As hit bi fel of a riche kyngÞat neuer mihte lauȝwhe in
                    gladyng…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þi deiteTo good ende bring vs ȝif
                    þi wille be. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Hou a kyng ferde hys brothur wyt oon (f. 195vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 279.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Als it felle of a riche kyngÞat neuermore lough in no
                    gladyng…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat we may thorewe tholemodnesCome to þat blisse
                    þat es endles
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Narracio de o reg[ ] dolente propter penam mort[ ] (p. 209, partly
                    cropped)

CULDd11.First Lines:
As it be fel of a riche kingÞat neuere myhte lawh in
                    glading…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& bringe vs to þat ilke blisÞer meke men
                    wiþ crist is

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Als it fell of a ryche kyngeþat neuer myght laght in
                    gladynge…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and brynge vs to þat blystfull veldeþat crystyn men
                    with cryste may welde

HunHM129.First Lines:
As hit fell off a ryche kyngeÞat neuyr myght lagh in
                    gladdynge…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And brynge vs to þat blesfull beldeÞat þolmode
                    men with crist schall welde
HunHM129.Note:
This MS begins four lines earlier, with last four lines of 5955 treated as first four of
                    this.
